metadata.dc:author: Pokniak, J A
Ramos, O
Cornejo, S B
Yáñez, E O
metadata.dc:description: Chemical and amino acidic composition of Opaque-2 corn, cultivar CIMMYT-TL 81-A (Hungarian compound) locally produced were determined. In addition, the productive performance of broiler chicks fed Opaque-2 corn or normal corn (Pioneer) for the first 28 days of age was evaluated. The chemical and amino acid content results obtained for the Opaque-2 corn studied, compared well ranges previously reported. The productive performance at the end of the experiment was similar between the two treatments assayed.
metadata.dc:title: Evaluación química y determinación del valor nutritivo de una variedad de maíz Opaco-2 en la ración inicial del broiler.
[Chemical evaluation and determination of the nutritive value of a variety of Opaque-2 corn in the initial diet of broilers].
